name: EURASIA DEMOCRACY INITIATIVE
description: Educate the public in US about the post-Communist world from the Balkans to Central Asia.
sampleDescriptions: Promoting enforcement of U.S. laws and policies against laundering corrupt assets from Central Asian kleptocrats, including by consulting with experts and democracy activists from the region.
Promoting enforcement of U.S. laws and policies against laundering corrupt assets from Central Asian kleptocrats, including by consulting with experts and democracy activists from the region.
Issues related to the enforcement of anti-kleptocracy and anti-money-laundering statutes. Issues related to combating anti-kleptocracy and corruption in Kazakhstan.
Issues related to investigations into corrupt proceeds from Kazakhstan kleptocracy being laundered in and through the United States.
